FHIR R4 Core Prototype Implementation Guide - December 2019 Release. Based on FHIR Version 4.0.1
Note: this is an initial prototype specification.

  • Narrative Content
  • Detailed Descriptions
  • XML
  • JSON

StructureDefinition-UKCore-Condition

This Condition resource has been constrained to represent a Condition profile.

Profile Minimum Viable Content

The following elements are mandatory in this UKCore-Condition FHIR profile (i.e. MUST be present):

  1. subject

The Minimum Viable Content for this profile has not yet been defined and may be added in a later release.

Formal Views of Profile Content

Description of Profiles, Differentials, and Snapshots.

The official URL for this profile is: https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Condition

Published on Tue Dec 03 11:54:26 GMT 2019 as draft by NHS Digital.

This profile builds on Condition

  • Text Summary
  • Full View
  • Differential View
  • All Views

Summary

Mandatory: 0 element (6 nested mandatory elements)
Fixed Value: 2 elements

Structures

This structure refers to these other structures:

  • https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Organization
  • unable to summarise profile https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Encounter (no profile found)
  • https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Practitioner

Slices

This structure defines the following Slices:

  • The element Condition.code.coding is sliced based on the value of value:system
  • The element Condition.bodySite.coding is sliced based on the value of value:system
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Condition
identifier
assigner 0..1Reference(UK Core Organization Profile)
code
coding 0..*(Slice Definition)Slice: Unordered, Open by value:system
coding:snomedCT 0..*CodingBinding: UK Core Condition Code (extensible)
system 1..1uriFixed Value: http://snomed.info/sct
code 1..1code
display 1..1string
bodySite
coding 0..*(Slice Definition)Slice: Unordered, Open by value:system
coding:snomedCT 0..*CodingBinding: UK Core Body Site (extensible)
system 1..1uriFixed Value: http://snomed.info/sct
code 1..1code
display 1..1string
subject 1..1Reference(Group | UK Core Patient Profile)
encounter 0..1Reference(https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Encounter)
recorder 0..1Reference(UK Core Practitioner Profile | UK Core PractitionerRole Profile | UK Core Patient Profile | UK Core RelatedPerson)
asserter 0..1Reference(UK Core Practitioner Profile | UK Core PractitionerRole Profile | UK Core Patient Profile | UK Core RelatedPerson)
stage
assessment 0..*Reference(ClinicalImpression | DiagnosticReport | UK Core Observation Profile)
note
author[x] 0..1
authorReferenceReference(UK Core Practitioner Profile | UK Core Patient Profile | UK Core RelatedPerson | UK Core Organization Profile)
authorStringstring

Documentation for this format
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Condition I0..*Detailed information about conditions, problems or diagnoses
con-3: Condition.clinicalStatus SHALL be present if verificationStatus is not entered-in-error and category is problem-list-item
con-4: If condition is abated, then clinicalStatus must be either inactive, resolved, or remission
con-5: Condition.clinicalStatus SHALL NOT be present if verification Status is entered-in-error
id 0..1stringLogical id of this artifact
meta I0..1MetaMetadata about the resource
implicitRules ?!I0..1uriA set of rules under which this content was created
language I0..1codeLanguage of the resource content
Binding: CommonLanguages (preferred)
Max Binding: AllLanguages
text I0..1NarrativeText summary of the resource, for human interpretation
contained 0..*ResourceContained, inline Resources
extension I0..*ExtensionAdditional content defined by implementations
modifierExtension ?!I0..*ExtensionExtensions that cannot be ignored
identifier I0..*IdentifierExternal Ids for this condition
id 0..1stringUnique id for inter-element referencing
extension I0..*ExtensionAdditional content defined by implementations
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
use ?!I0..1codeusual | official | temp | secondary | old (If known)
Binding: IdentifierUse (required)
type I0..1CodeableConceptDescription of identifier
Binding: Identifier Type Codes (extensible)
system I0..1uriThe namespace for the identifier value
Example General: http://www.acme.com/identifiers/patient
value I0..1stringThe value that is unique
Example General: 123456
period I0..1PeriodTime period when id is/was valid for use
assigner I0..1Reference(UK Core Organization Profile)Organization that issued id (may be just text)
clinicalStatus ?!I0..1CodeableConceptactive | recurrence | relapse | inactive | remission | resolved
Binding: ConditionClinicalStatusCodes (required)
verificationStatus ?!I0..1CodeableConceptunconfirmed | provisional | differential | confirmed | refuted | entered-in-error
Binding: ConditionVerificationStatus (required)
category I0..*CodeableConceptproblem-list-item | encounter-diagnosis
Binding: ConditionCategoryCodes (extensible)
severity I0..1CodeableConceptSubjective severity of condition
Binding: Condition/DiagnosisSeverity (preferred)
code I0..1CodeableConceptIdentification of the condition, problem or diagnosis
Binding: Condition/Problem/DiagnosisCodes (example)
id 0..1stringUnique id for inter-element referencing
extension I0..*ExtensionAdditional content defined by implementations
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
coding I0..*(Slice Definition)Code defined by a terminology system
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:system

Binding: UK Core Condition Code (extensible)
id 0..1stringUnique id for inter-element referencing
extension I0..*ExtensionAdditional content defined by implementations
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url

code I1..1codeSymbol in syntax defined by the system
display I1..1stringRepresentation defined by the system
userSelected I0..1booleanIf this coding was chosen directly by the user
text I0..1stringPlain text representation of the concept

asserter I0..1Reference(UK Core Practitioner Profile | UK Core PractitionerRole Profile | UK Core Patient Profile | UK Core RelatedPerson)Person who asserts this condition
stage I0..*BackboneElementStage/grade, usually assessed formally
con-1: Stage SHALL have summary or assessment
id 0..1stringUnique id for inter-element referencing
extension I0..*ExtensionAdditional content defined by implementations
modifierExtension ?!I0..*ExtensionExtensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

Binding: ConditionStage (example)

Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url

authorReferenceReference(UK Core Practitioner Profile | UK Core Patient Profile | UK Core RelatedPerson | UK Core Organization Profile)
authorStringstring
time I0..1dateTimeWhen the annotation was made
text I1..1markdownThe annotation - text content (as markdown)
